

public class Oops1 {
	int a,b,c;
	void details()
	{
		
		a=10;
		b=20;
		c=a+b;
		
	}
	void dis()
	{
		System.out.println("a= "+a);
		System.out.println("b= "+b);
		System.out.println("c= "+c);
		
	}
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Oops1 R=new Oops1();
		R.details();
		R.dis();
		
	}

}
